oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Boppin' the Blues: A Celebration of Sam Phillips - 2016-05-28
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Concert performances celebrating the music influenced by Sam Phillips from the CMA Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on May 28, 2016. In support of the exhibit Flyin’ Saucers Rock & Roll: The Cosmic Genius of Sam Phillips.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: the Planet Rockers; Webb Wilder; Margo Price; JD McPherson; Jerry Phillips;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Hosted by Michael Gray. Performances include; I'm Burning (Webb Wilder with the Planet Rockers) -- Poolside (Webb Wilder with the Planet Rockes) -- Down The Line (Webb Wilder and the Planet Rockers) -- Ubangi Stomp (Webb Wilder and the Planet Rockers) -- Since You Put Me Down (Margo Price) -- Big River (Margo Price) -- Don't Be Cruel (Margo Price) -- Tennessee Song (Margo Price) -- Love My Baby (JD McPherson and the Planet Rockers) -- Break Up - (JD McPherson and the Planet Rockers) -- My Gal Mary Ann (JD McPherson and the Planet Rockers) -- North Side Gal (JD McPherson and the Planet Rockers) -- No More Crying The Blues (Sonny George and the Planet Rockers) -- Folsom Prison Blues (Sonny George and the Planet Rockers) -- My Babe (Jerry Phillips and the Planet Rockers) -- You're Never Too Short To Rock (Jerry Phillips and the Planet Rockers) -- Billy Thunder (Sonny George with Billy Swartz on drums with the Planet Rockers) -- Ones All The Law Will Allow (Sonny George with the Planet Rockers) -- Boppin The Blues (entire cast).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Phillips, Sam, 1923-2003; Planet Rockers (Musical group); Price, Margo, 1983- ; Phillips, Jerry; McPherson, JD; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
